name: Kingfisher (Torabisu)
description:
A peaceful rhythm game about a hero who just wants to fish!

This game was made for the GBJam8 2020 gameboy jam! Please enjoy!

Controls: 

Arrow keys for the D-pad

Z is for the gameboy A button

X is for the B button 

Enter is for START

If you find the game too hard, you can enter an immortality cheat in the title screen:

up->down->left->right->A->B

Note: this gamejam was themed around the Game Boy. I have no affiliation with Nintendo or the Game Boy at all.

(This game saves your progress).
